item.content:encoded:
Alex & Me is the remarkable true story of an extraordinary relationship between psychologist Irene M. Pepperberg and Alex, an African Grey parrot who proved scientists and accepted wisdom wrong by demonstrating an astonishing ability to communicate and understand complex ideas. A New York Times bestseller and selected as one of the paper’s Top Ten Books of the Year, Alex & Me is much more that the story of an incredible scientific breakthrough. It’s a poignant love story and an affectionate remembrance of Pepperberg’s irascible, unforgettable, and always surprising best friend.

The post Alex & Me – Irene Pepperberg (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.

Should you act like ‘top dog’ to maintain control? No, you’re better off displaying your friendliness – and not just to your dog. Which breed is the cleverest? That’s the wrong […]

The post The Genius of Dogs : Discovering the Unique Intelligence of Man’s Best Friend – Brian Hare, Vanessa Woods (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
The international bestseller that reveals the amazing mind of your favourite friend

Is your dog purposefully disobeying you? Probably, and usually behind your back. Should you act like ‘top dog’ to maintain control? No, you’re better off displaying your friendliness – and not just to your dog. Which breed is the cleverest? That’s the wrong question to ask.

These are just some of the extraordinary insights to be found in The Genius of Dogs – the seminal book on how dogs evolved their unique intelligence by award-winning scientist Dr Brian Hare. He shares more than two decades of startling discoveries about the mysteries of the dog mind and how you can use his groundbreaking work to build a better relationship with your own dog.

The post The Genius of Dogs : Discovering the Unique Intelligence of Man’s Best Friend – Brian Hare, Vanessa Woods (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.

item.title: Training Tips For Your New Dog : What To Do When Your Dog Is Chewing, Tugging, And Biting: Raise The Perfect Dog – Eloy Dipiero (Abridged)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
A rewarding part of dog ownership is successfully training your dog. Training is an excellent way to bond with your dog and will help you build a good relationship with them. Whether young or old – all dogs can benefit from learning some basic commands. If you want to know how to stop your dog […]

The post Training Tips For Your New Dog : What To Do When Your Dog Is Chewing, Tugging, And Biting: Raise The Perfect Dog – Eloy Dipiero (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
A rewarding part of dog ownership is successfully training your dog. Training is an excellent way to bond with your dog and will help you build a good relationship with them. Whether young or old – all dogs can benefit from learning some basic commands. If you want to know how to stop your dog biting, chewing, tugging, or nipping, this book is for you!

This book will guide you on exactly how to quickly create an atmosphere in which a dog (even the most stubborn) will follow the training. These highly effective puppy aggression and behavioral training methods will then guide you and all involved to reaching fast success.

The post Training Tips For Your New Dog : What To Do When Your Dog Is Chewing, Tugging, And Biting: Raise The Perfect Dog – Eloy Dipiero (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
